original_title: ほんとにあった！呪いのビデオ20
overview: 20th entry in the popular "Honto ni Atta. Noroi no Video" series.
tagline: Fear grows! Earthbound spirits, vengeful spirits, floating spirits, guardian spirits. It's full of mysterious images that science can't figure out!
title: Honto ni Atta! Noroi no Video Vol. 20
